env.info: (hold 0) (plate 0) (at 0 4) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 sofa) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 table) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 teapoy) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 refrigerator) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 washmachine) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (closed 6) (sort 8 bottle) (size 8 small) (color 8 white) (sort 9 bottle) (size 9 small) (color 9 black) (inside 9 6) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 yellow) (sort 11 cup) (size 11 small) (color 11 white) (sort 12 cup) (size 12 small) (color 12 black) (sort 13 cup) (size 13 small) (color 13 yellow) (at 13 3) (sort 14 remotecontrol) (size 14 small) (color 14 red) (sort 15 remotecontrol) (size 15 small) (color 15 blue) (at 15 1)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X blue) (sort Y couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y washmachine)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow)))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X sofa))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y couch))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y couch))) )
test.nl: The blue remotecontrol must be on couch. The blue remotecontrol must be in washmachine. Do not go to couch. There must be the refrigerator is closed. Do not go to the table. Do not pick up the yellow bottle. Go to sofa. Pick up a cup. Put the bottle on couch. Put the remotecontrol on couch.
